content:
You need to install the required Python packages first. Let me provide you with exactly what to do:

1. Install the necessary packages:
```bash
pip3 install flask flask-cors werkzeug gunicorn
```

2. If you encounter additional missing packages as you run the code, install them as needed:
```bash
pip3 install requests
```

3. Then try running the server again:
```bash
python3 main.py --mock
```

This will install Flask and other required dependencies before running the main application. If you encounter any additional missing modules, you can install them similarly with pip3 install [package-name].
